Title: Recession Proof
Plot: A patient is admitted after breaking out in a severe rash triggered by caustic chemical exposure at his blue-collar job. As the team treats him, they discover that he has led his wife to believe that he is still maintaining his once-lucrative real estate career. Meanwhile, Cuddy is honored with an award and needs House to be at the charity event for support, but his attendance is threatened when his patient?s battle to survive forces him to question his practice and his own happiness, and Chase
GuestStars: Adrian LaTourelle, Ashley Jones, Tom Connolly, Mike Moh, Frank Drank
